Samantha Watts

Skills:

  • Experience in computer graphics and digital painting using the programs Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign, as well as Art Rage2 and Corel Painter.
  • Experience with character design, using Photoshop.
  • Experience with HTML and CSS
  • Strong design skills.
  • Experience in many different mediums of art: acrylics, charcoal, pen and ink, watercolor, colored pencil, computer graphics, graphite etc.
  • Experience in figure drawing.
  • Proficient in spoken and written Spanish and French

Education:

  • Bachelor of Arts in Art, Westmont College, Santa Barbara CA
  • Expected date of graduation May 2013. GPA in art major 3.667

Related Experience:

  • Design Editor
    Westmont Phoenix
    2012-2013
    I designed and created all promotional materials and the end-of-year arts magazine for Westmont College.
  • Graphic Design Intern
    Roadtrip Nation
    May 2012 to August 2012
    I created collages to be used for the website and workbooks of the nonprofit company Roadtrip Nation.
  • Graphic Design/Social Media Marketing Intern
    Smile Lounge Photobooth
    May 2012 to present
    I created design material and ran social media marketing for the start-up photo booth company.
  • Illustrator
    The Horizon
    I created editorial illustrations for the college newspaper publication "The Horizon".

Educational and Art Awards:

  • President’s Scholarship at Westmont College
  • Art Scholarship Westmont College
  • Selected to be featured in the annual Westmont art journal, “The Phoenix”
  • Orange County Fair Art Competition
